name: neo4j-avro-person-to-corporate-sink
neo4j.topic.cypher.avro-corporate: MERGE(c:Corporate{id:event.id}) SET c.name = event.name, c.referenceId = event.reference_id ,c.street = event.street, c.city = event.city
neo4j.topic.cypher.avro-person: MERGE(p:Person{id: event.id}) SET p.firstName = event.first_name, p.lastName = event.last_name, p.birthday = event.birthday, p.birthLocation = event.birth_location MERGE(c:Corporate{id:event.corporate_id}) MERGE (p)-[r:WORKS_AT]->(c)
